mapper.insert: insert into building(address, dong, ho, latitude, longitude, supply, exclusive, details, cost, license, image, createdAt) values(#{address}, #{dong}, #{ho}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{supply}, #{exclusive}, #{details}, #{cost}, #{license}, #{image}, now())
mapper.select: select distinct address, dong, ho, latitude, longitude from building
select num from building where num in (select num from building where address=#{address} and dong=#{dong} and ho=#{ho}) order by num desc limit 1
select * from building where address like #{address} and dong like #{dong}and ho like #{ho};
select count(*)+1 as rowcount from building
